meanings.definition: A person qualified to practice medicine, especially one who specializes in diagnosis and treatment.
meanings.sent1: The physicians at the hospital work hard to help sick people.
meanings.sent2: My family always goes to the same physicians for check-ups.
meanings.sent3: The physicians had a race to see who could diagnose the mystery illness first.
meanings.sent4: The physicians are like detectives, solving medical puzzles every day.
meanings.sent5: I admire the dedication of physicians who save lives with their knowledge.

meanings.sent1: The physicians in the clinic were friendly and caring.
meanings.sent2: When I was sick, the physicians took good care of me.
meanings.sent3: The physicians joked that laughter was the best medicine.
meanings.sent4: To me, the physicians are like superheroes in white coats.
meanings.sent5: I trust the physicians to provide expert medical advice and treatment.
